Chapter 2 Stir Fry 2.1 Tomato eggs with green peppers

Chapter 2 Stir Fry 2.1 Tomato eggs with green peppers 2.1.1 Meta Prep Time: 10 minutes Cook Time: 10 minutes Servings: 2 2.1.2 Ingredients Eggs (4) Salt [Optional] Soy Sauce (Dash) [Optional] Rice based cooking wine (Dash) Tomatoes (2 Large) Green Peppers (1. either spicy or not, either is ok!) Cooking oil 2.1.3 Preparation Whisk the eggs in a bowl with pinch of salt and optional soy sauce and cooking wine Chunk the tomato into thumb-sized pieces Chunk the pepper into thumb-sized pieces 2.1.4 Cooking In a hot oiled pan, scramble the eggs and set aside Reheat the pan with oil, stir fry green peppers and a pinch of salt for 3 minutes Add tomatoes to the pan and stir fry until tomatoes render juice Add cooked eggs back to the pan and stir fry for 2 minutes
